algorithm(MapController, EntityController) - Method in class entities.enemies.DumbTargeter
Algorithm calculates based off the map and the player where it will attempt to move next.
algorithm(MapController, EntityController) - Method in class entities.enemies.SmartTargeter
The algorithm method for the SmartTargeter is based off BFS to find the shortest distance from the player to the enemy.
algorithm(MapController, EntityController) - Method in class entities.enemies.StraightLineEnemy
The algorithm used by the enemy to calculate next move, checks whether the next cell in the direction it is facing is a wall, if so it turns around.
algorithm(MapController, EntityController) - Method in class entities.enemies.WallFollower
Calculates the WallFollowers next move based on the map.

D

decipher(String) - Static method in class utils.RequestHandler
Deciphers the puzzle taken from the Url by checkign the ordinal value of the character, adds 1/-1 to the ordinal and if it's over 90 to 65, less than 65 to 90.
